citation.title: Statement on the safety of MON810 maize pollen occurring in or as food

policy.title: Scientific opinion on maize MON 810 pollen as or in food

source.name: European Food Safety Authority
source.description: The European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) is an independent European agency which provides scientific advice on existing and emerging risks, as part of European Union (EU) risk assessments regarding food and feed safety.
